column4: What's a decent ubuntu torrent client that will allow you to add and manage downloads via ssh?
check out deluge in deamon mode (I think that's what they call it) or rtorrent
Does rtorrent have any way to monitor on the system itself? (I both SSH in and use it as a media server)
Rtorrent is a commandline torrent client. So you could have it running in a shared screen session or something.
